messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:Living is Learning Curriculum Guides??
messages.msgSnippet: I needed volume 1, which I already ordered... hope someone else can use them though :) Thanks! Steph in NY ... From: Soglad2behome@aol.com To:
messages.messageBody:
I needed volume 1, which I already ordered... hope someone else can use them though :)
Thanks!
Steph in NY
----- Original Message -----
From: Soglad2behome@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, October 01, 2002 3:22 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:Living is Learning Curriculum Guides??


In a message dated 9/30/02 11:28:23 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Subject: Re: anyone have comments on Living is Learning Curriculum
> Guides????
>
> I have a few of them.. definitely worth the expenditure.-Particularly if
> you are in a state where you need to supply 'something to someone'.
> Nancy Plent is a fabulous lady....
> Love, Judy
>

I have 3 of them (vol 2-4) that I used in MA (for ed plans/progress reports).
I don't need them now in TX, so I'm selling them. Email me directly at
edavis1234@... if interested.

~Ellen
